explains: adv. 不害臊地；不怕羞地

sentences.en: You’ll never be free unless you unabashedly proclaim it within.
sentences.cn: 你永远不会自由， 除非你不加掩饰地宣布它 存 在。

sentences.en: You'll never be free unless you unabashedly proclaim it within.

sentences.en: And it is unabashedly using the energy card to promote its membership of the EU. This requires co-operation with Russia.
sentences.cn: 它不掩饰自己为加入欧盟而打能源牌，这需要与俄罗斯合作。
